doc.title: 02:06 - Anatomija bola
doc.plot: A documentary about the 1999 NATO bombing of the RTS-Serbian state TV, in which 16 people died. Shows the grief of their families and their accusations against the heads of the TV station, believed to have sacrificed their crew for the reasons of propaganda.
